testcaseName: Dose # 1 PCV 13 at 24 mo-5 days.  Valid but child needs another.
forecastTestType: Recommended based on minimum interval from previous dose (catch-up)
generalDescription: This test case describes when a child is administered the first dose of the Pneumococcal 13 vaccine at 24 months - 5 days, that the dose is considered to be valid, but a second dose is still needed.
